attributes.action: Re-establish the British Empire and show the world what a great nation this land is.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We seek the re-establishment of the British Empire by the introduction of military National Service and the conscription of the long term unemployed, followed by subsequent invasion of the continent and former colonies. Let Britain be once again the shinging beacon of democracy, fair play and cups of tea that it once was.
